item.title: Memory Layouts
item.description: Vector A vector data structure can make use of an extremely sparse memory structure --------------------------------------------------- | destructor_fn | size | capacity | data[0] | ... | --------------------------------------------------- ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Vector Metadata Vector Data Generally speaking, the user would get back a pointer to the first element of the vector Internal logic will be able to access the memory of the metadata
item.content:
Vector

A vector data structure can make use of an extremely sparse memory structure

---------------------------------------------------
| destructor_fn | size | capacity | data[0] | ... |
---------------------------------------------------
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Vector Metadata Vector Data
  • Generally speaking, the user would get back a pointer to the first element of the vector
  • Internal logic will be able to access the memory of the metadata
